codeGet:
select spraddr_pidm, spraddr_atyp_code, spraddr_seqno, spraddr_status_ind, spraddr_street_line1, spraddr_street_line2, spraddr_city, spraddr_zip, spraddr_natn_code, spraddr_surrogate_id as ID
from spraddr
where spraddr_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
and spraddr_atyp_code = (select nvl(to_char(gurocfg_value), 'TT') as address_type
                        from gurocfg
                        where gurocfg_name = 'aip.term.address.type')
and spraddr_to_date is  null
codePost:
declare 
cursor ta is
select spraddr_pidm, spraddr_atyp_code, spraddr_seqno
from spraddr
where spraddr_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
and spraddr_atyp_code = 'TT'
and SPRADDR_TO_DATE is null
and SPRADDR_STATUS_IND is null;
l_atype_code VARCHAR2(30);
l_seqno_inout  spraddr.spraddr_seqno%TYPE;
l_rowid_out rowid; 
begin
select nvl(to_char(gurocfg_value), 'TT') as address_type
into l_atype_code
from gurocfg
where gurocfg_name = 'aip.term.address.type';
FOR term_address in ta
LOOP
update SPRADDR 
set SPRADDR_STATUS_IND = 'I', SPRADDR_TO_DATE = sysdate
WHERE SPRADDR_PIDM = term_address.SPRADDR_PIDM 
AND SPRADDR_ATYP_CODE = term_address.SPRADDR_ATYP_CODE 
AND SPRADDR_SEQNO = term_address.SPRADDR_SEQNO;
END LOOP;
gb_address.p_create(
    p_pidm             => :parm_user_pidm,
    p_atyp_code        => l_atype_code,
    p_seqno_inout      => l_seqno_inout,
    p_street_line1     => :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE1,
    p_street_line2     => :SPRADDR_STREET_LINE2,
    p_city             => :SPRADDR_CITY,
    p_zip              => :SPRADDR_ZIP,
    p_natn_code        => :SPRADDR_NATN_CODE,
    p_from_date        => SYSDATE,
    p_rowid_out        => l_rowid_out);
end;
